title: Nighthawk T-Shirt Design
content:
I'd like to get some feedback on this. This is a low-res version of a 300 dpi file, intended for T-shirt screen printing. Let me know what I can improve.   
   
 ![Nighthawk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106073327im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/24186.jpg)
author: Daniel Poindexter

comments.content: The g descender is nice but a little thick for my eye

I am going to have to agree with Hector about the g.   
   
Have you thought of drawing the stealths as vectors? Sometimes photos on tshirts look kinda funny imo.   
   
I do like the composition of the planes though, how it gives the feeling of one being under the other.

I don't think you should outline that mark in the background. simplify it and it will act more background and less like it is trying to be the center of attention. I guess my problem is hierarchy, there is not enough division.
